articles.author: Michael Wayland
articles.title: Why Ford is keeping its Mustang gas-powered as part of its electric vehicle push - CNBC
articles.description: Ford CEO Jim Farley believes keeping the iconic American brand gas-powered makes good business sense for the automaker for the foreseeable future.
articles.content:
Ford Chair Bill Ford and President and CEO Jim Farley converse in front of newly revealed Mustang Dark Horse at The Stampede in downtown Detroit on Sept. 14, 2022.
DETROIT Ford Motor CEO Jim Farley … [+4937 chars]
